article_title: Up To 1 Million Taxpayers Could See Delayed Refunds After Obamacare Snafu

article_metadata.description: Taxpayers who purchased health care coverage through the Marketplace in 2014 may have to wait to file their tax returns. Healthcare.gov and Covered California are both acknowledging that they sent out bad tax forms which could potentially delay refunds for up to one million taxpayers.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Taxpayers who purchased health care coverage through the Marketplace in 2014 may have to wait to file their tax returns.
